TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1052-1053
TEI.2.document_title: William Johnson to Stephen F. Austin, 02-28-1825

barker_notes.barker_summary: William Johnson to Austin, February 28, 1825. Emigration. Adams elected president.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1052-1053

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*William Johnson to Austin, February 28, 1825. Emigration. Adams elected president.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Woodville*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="02-28-1825">February 28th 1825*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dear Sir,*/p*
*p*The inclosed letters to my friend *person_mentioned*Judge Child*/person_mentioned*, were this moment handed to me by *person_mentioned*Mr. Royall*/person_mentioned* of *location_mentioned*Alabama*/location_mentioned*, who is on his way to your *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned*—And as *person_mentioned*Mr. R*/person_mentioned*. has no acquaintance in your *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*I take the liberty of saying to you that from the respectability of the writers of those letters as well as what I have seen of him, I have no doubt but that you will find *person_mentioned*Mr. R*/person_mentioned*. a Gentleman of worth and charactor—Within a few days a report has reached us from *location_mentioned*Wash- ington City*/location_mentioned* stating that *person_mentioned*John Q. Adams*/person_mentioned* is elected *person_mentioned*President*/person_mentioned*—The result is said to be 13 *location_mentioned*States */location_mentioned*for*person_mentioned* Adams*/person_mentioned*—7 *location_mentioned*States*/location_mentioned* for *person_mentioned*Genl- Jackson*/person_mentioned* and 4 *location_mentioned*States */location_mentioned*for *person_mentioned*Mr. Crawford*/person_mentioned*—I think the report doubtful—*person_mentioned*Mr. Huff*/person_mentioned* is now on his way to *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned* with his *person_mentioned*family */person_mentioned*and outfit etc and I am greatly in hopes that he will arrive safe and fulfill your expectations—There are a number of *person_mentioned*Gentlemen of fortune*/person_mentioned* and respectability who talk strongly of visiting your *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned* this *date_mentioned n="Spring-1825">spring*/date_mentioned*—*/p* *p* *person_mentioned*Wm. Johnson*/person_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Hon. Stephen F. Austin */person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
